query: Provide a list of commands to configure 16 switch ports start at 192.168.0.1/24?
response:
To configure 16 switch ports starting at 192.168.0.1/24, you can use the following commands:
```bash
# Configure the first switch port
nv set interface swp192s0 ip address 192.168.0.1/24

# Configure the remaining 15 switch ports
for i in {2..16}; do
    nv set interface swp192s$i ip address 192.168.0.$((i))/24
done
```
This will configure 16 switch ports starting at 192.168.0.1/24 with unique IP addresses within the subnet.

To view the startup configuration of each leaf switch, you can use the following command:
```bash
nv config show -o commands
```
This will display the startup configuration of each leaf switch in the current configuration.

If you want to view the startup configuration of all leaf switches, you can use the following command:
```bash
nv config show -o commands | grep "leaf"
```
This will display the startup configuration of all leaf switches in the current configuration.

If you want to view the startup configuration of a specific leaf switch, you can use the following command:
```bash
nv config show -o commands | grep "leaf" | grep "leaf1"
```
This will display the startup configuration of the leaf switch named "leaf1" in the current configuration.

Note that the startup configuration of each leaf switch is stored in the `startup.yaml` file located at `/etc/nvue.d/startup.yaml`. You can view the contents of this file using the following command:
```bash
cat /etc/nvue.d/startup.yaml
```
This will display the contents of the `startup.yaml` file, which contains the startup configuration of all leaf switches.

query: What command to use enable RoCE in lossless mode?
response:
To enable RoCE in lossless mode, use the following command:
```bash
nv set qos roce enable on
nv set qos roi mode lossless
```
This command enables RoCE in lossless mode.
